name: Caldwell - Hit & Run Part Deux (Room 101) - Almost Churchill
additionalNotes:
They’ve done the hit and run, and now these two perps return to the scene of the crime for a good old fashioned sequel. The Hit and Run Part Deux (Rip and Dip) from Robert Caldwell and Matt Booth, and this latest limited edition release from the Room101 and Caldwell founders is sure to be one for the 
Handmade by Tabacalera William Ventura, the home of many of Caldwell’s releases and the original Hit and Run, Part Deux (Rip & Dip) is a gorgeous gem. Offered in the same style 10-count box of its predecessor, Hit and Run Part Deux features a tri-country mixture of long-filler tobaccos. The DR, Nicaragua, and the good ol’ U.S. combine to create a bolder profile than the original cigar, brimming with tons of rich spice, leather, and natural tobacco charm.
